item.description: If you like to work in gardens, please meet Irina and Sharl at the MSSF East Entrance for an hour or two of weeding. A bonus is that you'll learn about the native plants at the garden from our plant expert Irina. Please bring your own gardening tools, and gloves. It won't be hard work, just weeding and a little light trimming.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Weed the East Entrance Native Plant Garden. Yea, fun, fun, fun!
